blog.name: super-hero-confessions
blog.title: Super-Hero-Confessions
blog.description:
Super-hero-confessions is a blog where you can submit your confessions/personal opinions about any of the super hero movies, comics, television shows, cartoons, etc.

The confessions that are posted are those that are submitted; not the opinions of the blog owners. All the confessions will be anonymous when posted. Feel free to submit photos along with your confession if you would like as well.

If you want us to see a post tag it with either #superheroconfessions or #superhero confessions

summary: I’m watching Civil War bc I love pain and I’m at the part when Tony is talking to Peter before the airport fight and my dad (who...
body:
I’m watching Civil War bc I love pain and I’m at the part when Tony is talking to Peter before the airport fight and my dad (who has never seen a Marvel movie before) was like “Is that his kid?”

My dad can see Irondad even before it was a thing lmao

reblog.comment:

title: Tony, T’Challa, and Memes
body:
So.  Ever since Black Panther came out, I’ve been seeing a lot of posts where Shuri and Peter are confusing/reducing to tears/driving to drink T’Challa and Tony with memes.  

Last night, that got me thinking.  What if Tony and T’Challa realize the kids are doing that on purpose, and start educating themselves on memes?  They don’t let Peter and Shuri know right away, but wait until they can just throw them out unselfconsciously, and then drop the boom on them.

The kids are shaken, because the adults FIGURED IT OUT, and Tony and T’Challa are insufferably smug for at least a couple of hours.

The rest of the Avengers, meanwhile, continue to be confused because they haven’t quite put it together yet.

blog.name: ao3feed-peterparker
blog.title: AO3Feed: Peter Parker
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive of Our Own under the tag Peter Parker. The stories are automatically posted here from the RSS feed.

title: Great Expectations
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Ccxo0n

by springtime22

A few years after Thanos is defeated, Peter drops out of MIT and walks away from his responsibilities as the future air of Stark Industries.

The world loses its mind.

As does Tony, which is Peter’s number one reason for avoiding him and his phone calls. That’s easy when the entire world thinks Tony is dead, but becomes significantly harder after Nick Fury places Peter under house arrest in Tony’s secluded cabin after a minor infraction of the revised accords.

Also, there’s trouble brewing in Queens.

Words: 2155, Chapters: 1/7, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Iron Man (Movies), Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017), The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Marvel Cinematic Universe
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply

blog.name: ao3feed-peterparker
blog.title: AO3Feed: Peter Parker
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive of Our Own under the tag Peter Parker. The stories are automatically posted here from the RSS feed.

title: Arachnida
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2TvYzhC

by ivymyst

Peter knew a thing or two about multiple realities, or so he thought. He just didn’t expect to find an alternate version of himself trying to beat the living daylights out of *him* while out on patrol one night.

“Dude! Why are you trying to kill me if I’m you?”

“You are not me. If you were me, you wouldn’t be so easy to take down.”

And why doesn’t he trust Mr. Stark?

-

A somewhat Spider-Verse style take on a slightly Dark Mirror-Verse MCU Peter Parker where he meets a goofier, happier version of himself in a different timeline.

Words: 2393, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, Spider-Man - All Media Types
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence
  • Categories: Gen
  • Characters: Peter Parker, Tony Stark
  • Relationships: Peter Parker & Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence, Mirror Universe, Alternate Timelines, Dark Peter Parker, Precious Peter Parker, Dark Tony Stark, Tony Stark Has A Heart, Tony Stark Has Issues, Peter Parker Has Issues, Spider-Verse, Kinda


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2TvYzhC
